languages.text: {n}Соломон закрывает глаза, словно в молитве.{/n} "Лишь Бог-Император совершенен и может трактовать дух закона. Мы же следуем букве как верные слуги Его".
{n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон закрывает глаза, словно в молитве.{/n} "Лишь Бог-Император совершенен и может трактовать дух закона. Мы же следуем букве как верные слуги Его".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは祈りを捧げるかのように目を閉じた。{/n}「完璧なのは唯一、神帝陛下のみであり、法の精神を解釈できるのも陛下だけだ。俺たちは忠実なしもべとして、ただ法の文言に従うだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは祈りを捧げるかのように目を閉じた。{/n}「完璧なのは唯一、神帝陛下のみであり、法の精神を解釈できるのも陛下だけだ。俺たちは忠実なしもべとして、ただ法の文言に従うだけだ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schließt wie im Gebet die Augen.{/n} "Nur der Gottimperator ist perfekt und kann den Geist des Gesetzes deuten. Wir folgen als Seine gläubigen Diener den Worten."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schließt wie im Gebet die Augen.{/n} "Nur der Gottimperator ist perfekt und kann den Geist des Gesetzes deuten. Wir folgen als Seine gläubigen Diener den Worten."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux comme pour prier.{/n} « Seul l'Empereur-Dieu est parfait et peut interpréter l'esprit de la loi. Nous suivons la lettre en tant que Ses plus fidèles serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux comme pour prier.{/n} « Seul l'Empereur-Dieu est parfait et peut interpréter l'esprit de la loi. Nous suivons la lettre en tant que Ses plus fidèles serviteurs. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos como si rezase.{/n} «Solo el Dios Emperador es perfecto y puede interpretar el espíritu de la ley. Nosotros la seguimos al pie de la letra como Sus siervos fieles».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos como si rezase.{/n} «Solo el Dios Emperador es perfecto y puede interpretar el espíritu de la ley. Nosotros la seguimos al pie de la letra como Sus siervos fieles».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙闭上双眼，仿佛在祈祷。{/n}“只有神皇才是完美的，只有祂才能阐释律法的本质。我们是祂忠心耿耿的仆人，我们谨守祂的律法。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙闭上双眼，仿佛在祈祷。{/n}“只有神皇才是完美的，只有祂才能阐释律法的本质。我们是祂忠心耿耿的仆人，我们谨守祂的律法。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sanki dua edercesine gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Bir tek Tanrı İmparator kusursuzdur ve kanunların ruhunu yorumlayabilir. O'nun sadık hizmetkârları olan bizlerse kanunlara harfiyen uyarız."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne closes his eyes as if in prayer.{/n} "Only the God-Emperor is perfect and can interpret the spirit of the law. We follow the letter of it as His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sanki dua edercesine gözlerini kapar.{/n} "Yalnızca Tanrı İmparator kusursuzdur ve kanunların ruhunu yorumlayabilir. O'nun sadık hizmetkârları olan bizlerse harfiyen takip ederiz."
